snippet: An expanding network of trails will let creatures great and small roam around to bring them closer to visitors and raise conservation awareness.
abstract: Philadelphia Zoo has installed expanding network of trails that will let animals roam around to bring them closer to visitors and raise conservation awareness; installation is part of plan to allow variety of species to wander from place to place and rotate them through habitats.
lead_paragraph: An expanding network of trails will let creatures great and small roam around to bring them closer to visitors and raise conservation awareness.

headline.main: With Treetop Trail, Philadelphia Zoo Opens Grounds to Prowlers
headline.print_headline: With Treetop Trail, Philadelphia Zoo Opens Grounds to Prowlers
